title: Book Cover, "Bookjackets by Alvin Lustig for "The Longest Journey" by E.M Forester, New Directions Books", 1947
medium: Lithography in blue and black ink on off-white shiny wove paper
signed: Signed in pritned black ink, lower left: lustig.
inscribed:
Printed in vertically in white ink, spine: THE LONGEST JOURNEY; in black ink: E M FORSTER. Printed horizontally in black, within white square at lower margin of spine: NC 4. 

Printed in white ink, front cover right center: e m forster; lower left: the longest journey.
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Bookjacket designs. Design on blue ground.Cover depicts maze-like arrangement of black rectilinear forms. A thin, white line is drawn between the walls of this maze. Title and author's name written within the black maze-like forms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, "Bookjackets by Alvin Lustig for "The Longest Journey" by E.M Forester, New Directions Books", 1947.
1947. Lithography in blue and black ink on off-white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-165-2.
